title: Is my cursor causing lag?
body: Some of you may have seen my post regarding my thinking of URF causing my game to lag, well, it hasn't gone away; however, I have noticed that moving my cursor in game is causing massive FPS/ping spikes and rapid declines. Has anyone else experienced this and do you guys have any suggestions?

replies.body: lower your graphics quality. Also servers being temperamental atm. I dc for no reason at all, 30 ping 60 fps, then BAM! dc without any ping. Last 10 sec then goes. Comes back every 3-5 min thereafter. + most the other people seem to have this problem 2.
Hi thanks for reply, the thing is i already lowered graphics to very low and its not helping either. Should I just wait it out?
I forgot to mention that tabbing usually works if its set to low, and if not restart the game, if they doesn't work your going to need to restart your modem and/or PC
